summary:
My Main Menu customized with a Skyrim Wallpaper and the music Dream Chasers.
To hear it > http://youtube/YftLJBLie8o
descriptionHtml:
My Main Menu customized with a Skyrim Wallpaper and the music Dream Chasers.
To hear it > http://youtube/YftLJBLie8o

 Installation
decompressed the archive on \"C:\\Program Files\\The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim\\Data\"
or download it with Nexus Mod Manager.

 Uninstall
- Delete folder \"meshes\", \"Music\" and delete file : \"C:\\Program Files\\The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim\\Data\\textures\\interface\\objects\\Background_d.dds\"
or desable it with Nexus Mod Manger

 Product by Kenkyo
 Picture edited with Gimp 2.8
 Music found in Checco85 mod > http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15647

Enjoy it !
author: Kenkyo
